mapper.select: SELECT EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD AS authGrpCd /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_AUTH_MAPPING /* 권한 맵핑 */ ,EZC_AUTH_GRP /* 권한 그룹 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD = EZC_AUTH_GRP.AUTH_GRP_CD AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_AUTH_MAPPING_PK(P),FK_EZC_AUTH_GRP_EZC_AUTH_MAPPI(R),SYS_C0011220(C) */ AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_AUTH_MAPPING_PK(P),FK_EZC_MGR_EZC_AUTH_MAPPING(R),SYS_C0011221(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_AUTH_MAPPING /* 권한 맵핑 */ ,EZC_AUTH_GRP /* 권한 그룹 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD = EZC_AUTH_GRP.AUTH_GRP_CD AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD AS authGrpCd /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_AUTH_MAPPING /* 권한 맵핑 */ ,EZC_AUTH_GRP /* 권한 그룹 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD = EZC_AUTH_GRP.AUTH_GRP_CD AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_GRP_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_AUTH_MAPPING SET /* 권한 맵핑 */ WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_AUTH_MAPPING /* 권한 맵핑 */ WHERE 1=1 AND AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 권한 그룹 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
